articles.description: Nitish Kumar Reddy hits a superb first Test century to keep India in the fourth Test - but Australia remain in a strong position at the end of day three.
articles.title: Australia v India: Nitish Kumar Reddy hits century in fourth Test

articles.description: There are only two English managers or head coaches in the Premier League, a lower total than ever before - but why?
articles.title: Premier League: Why are there only two English managers in top flight?

articles.description: World number one Scottie Scheffler will miss the first two weeks of the 2025 PGA Tour season after undergoing surgery on a hand injury sustained cooking Christmas dinner.
articles.title: Scottie Scheffler Christmas dinner injury: World number one to miss start of season

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says winger Bukayo Saka is likely to be out for "more than two months" after undergoing surgery on his injured hamstring.
articles.title: Bukayo Saka: Injured Arsenal winger faces "more than two months" out

articles.description: With out-of-contract players able to speak to clubs abroad from 1 January, which Premier League stars could be lining up a move?
articles.title: Which Premier League players could leave on a free in summer?

articles.description: Kai Havertz scores the only goal as Arsenal beat a stubborn Ipswich Town side to move up to second in the Premier League.
articles.title: Arsenal 1-0 Ipswich: Kai Havertz claims first-half winner

articles.description: Ninth seed Damon Heta hits a nine-darter but is knocked out by Englishman Luke Woodhouse in the third round of the PDC World Championship.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025 results: Damon Heta hits nine-darter in loss to Luke Woodhouse

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Brighton & Hove Albion vs Brentford in the Premier League
articles.title: Brighton 0-0 Brentford: Seagulls' winless run continues after dull goalless draw

articles.description: Despite the big money spent to bring him to the club, new Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim says if he does not win games the sack awaits.
articles.title: Man Utd: Ruben Amorim says job is in 'danger' if his side does not start winning

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Isak, Gordon, Gakpo, Cunha, Joelinton
